description: Ski every run in comfort. Crafted for female skiers, the Panterra 85 GW is an adjustable boot that lets you drive downhill with confidence. A medium flex gives you a little more power through your turns, and it transmits power efficiently to your ski. The sculpted liners are ready to go straight out of the box. But you can also thermo-mould them, creating a totally unique fit.  In a design that smashes comfort and stability together, this boot is ready to ride all over the resort.Lightweight PU shell construction reduces weight.Power Cage design transmits power to the ski and stabilizes the leg.Cabrio 3 piece shell design flexes consistently and absorbs shock.Variable Volume Fit allows adjustment of the forefoot width.Contour 4 Fit Technology fits securely while allowing extra room where needed.My Fit system offers customizable fit at the shell and liner.Adjustable rear cuff lets you customize the boot's height to your calf.Dynalink heel strap keeps the foot from sliding.Grip Walk soles allow nearly-normal walking with a rockered design.Dura-grip replaceable heels and toes.
name: Dalbello Panterra 85 W GW Ski Boots
